name: Pacific Warships: World of Naval PvP Warfare
name_original: Pacific Warships: World of Naval PvP Warfare
description:
⚓Pacific Warships: World of Naval Battle⚓
Play FREE shooter and become an armada commander! Welcome to the future world of naval combat!
Try PACIFIC WARSHIPS in a massive torpedo and missiles battleship warfare. Call your crew, ready your warships and blitz the Seven seas rim. Pacific fleet meets tactics and action in navy warfare shooter. Tons of navy weapons, artillery and battleships to shoot your enemy with a tsunami of missiles and torpedoes in a REAL-TIME team PVP war.🚢🚢🚢
Collect your navy gunships in a port and form the best war fleet from Atlantic to Pacific rim. To fight enemy in ocean warfare, blitz your fleet through sea ways where oil tankers used to sail. Be the champion of the seashore rim!
Action-packed PvP shooter offers you new realistic navy wargame on future battlefield.
🛰WORLD ONLINE PvP
Fight with battleship armadas from around the world in PvP warfare
🛳CALL ARMADA FLEET
Detailed corsair warships such as Arrow, Avenger, Spearhead, and Eclipse, divided into several classes from lightweight destroyers to battleships, dreadnaughts and aircraft carriers which look like floating fortresses on duty!
🌐TACTICAL BLITZ
Armada of different gunships! Pick ones that match your combat tactics and fight. The goal is to spot, scout and sink enemies. Torpedo them in close combat, barrage them from afar like a juggernaut or use air force to drop bombs and torpedoes on enemy fleet. Build up epic drones to balance your ship.
🔫FUTURE WEAPONS
Arm your warship fleet with lasers, artillery, torpedoes, missiles and battle drones to win in a PvP warfare. Use it wise in a massive PvP battle!
🛠UPGRADE FLEET
Upgrade armada to be strong in epic conflict! Build a variety of corsair guns, missiles, lasers, chassis and deck upgrades to forge your gunship into an ultimate weapon. All upgrades change ships’ look and armor!
🤖ABILITIES
Get aggressive in your warfare tactics with cool shooter abilities. Be invisible and sink gunships at point blank, use energy shields, repair during battle, use EMP to destroy torpedoes and burn enemies with laser. Master shooting to become the best commander of the future ships in the world!
👨‍✈️CAPTAIN’S BATTLESHIPS SKILLS
Improve your stats by researching a skill tree. It’s not only about a ships armada - the crew matters too. Learn new action skills and sink enemies more effectively!
🏝CAPTURE NAVAL AREAS
The team with more rim points wins! Form an alliance with teammates' battleships and don’t let enemies capture your rim area! Use torpedoes or active abilities! Conquer the whole sea world!
🤼ADVANCED MATCHMAKING
All battles in the wargame are created automatically, just click "FIGHT" button. Teams and opponents will be picked up automatically so you can start having fun fast!
🎮EASY CONTROLS
Intuitive control and easy UI will let you blitz into battle straight away and master the naval warfare!
🎁AMAZING GIFTS AND REWARDS
Log into the game for rewards, gunship upgrades and gifts! Complete daily quests and challenges for more combat rewards.
💻STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS
Future is here! The most realistic navy PvP for mobile. Play the wargame and check it out! The game will run even on a budget device!
⚓GRAPHIC OPTIONS FOR WEAK DEVICES
Weak device? Choose the graphics options even for weak devices!
★★★Our navy PvP is completely FREE to download!
Perfectly drawn battlefield textures, beautiful sky and islands rims, vivid sea, drones. We created a next-level naval action. Regular updates and new content are waiting for you in online wargame of 2019.
Not sure what to play? Choose⚓PACIFIC WARSHIPS⚓
